anomdetect.adtk_bounds module¶

class anomdetect.adtk_bounds.ADTK_Bounds(adtk_obj, s)¶

Bases: object

This class creates the mathematical bounds that the ADTK package uses in order to determine if a point is an anomaly or not.

ratio_bounds(numerator, denominator, delta=1)¶

Calculate the ratio bounds for ADTK algorithms.

Parameters

delta (float) – Required; default 1. Offset to bounds.

Returns

Pandas DataFrame with ratio bound violations.

univ_bounds(delta=0.0001)¶

Calculate the univariate bounds for ADTK algorithms.

Parameters

delta (float) – Required; default .0001. Offset to bounds.

Returns

Pandas DataFrame with univariate bound violations.
